## both variable

Applies `q` individually to both input vals `x y` and combines results with `and`<!-- -->. The final result will be true if both interim results were truthy.

( x y q -- qx &amp;&amp; qy )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
both: import("./api").StackFn
```
